summary: Organized AI-first platform architecture with Rocker learning loop, KPI Flo, and work reporting system

changes.description: Added Phase 13 (Rocker Learning Loop), Phase 14 (KPI Flo), and Phase 15 (Work Reporting System)
Added rockerLearning config with models, interventions, and policies. Added kpiFloConfig for live metrics
Created CI workflow to validate work reports on every PR
Created validation script that enforces work-report.json requirements
Created evidence pack validation workflow with HTTP and RLS tests
Created bash script to validate evidence pack, test APIs, and verify RLS
Created SQL test suite for RLS policy verification
Created PR template requiring work reports and acceptance checks
Created initial work report for this organizational change

next: Implement Rocker learning tables and RPCs from spec
Set up CI secrets for test runs
Seed test data for CI validation
